thread.title: Corridor Company Sponsors, Exhibits at IACCM Americas Forum 2015, Oct. 6-8, in Henderson, Nevada
thread.title_full: Corridor Company Sponsors, Exhibits at IACCM Americas Forum 2015, Oct. 6-8, in Henderson, Nevada - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Corridor Company Sponsors, Exhibits at IACCM Americas Forum 2015, Oct. 6-8, in Henderson, Nevada
text:
For the eighth straight year, leading contract management solution provider Corridor Company will join colleagues across industries at the premier learning event for contract professionals.
Wakefield, Mass. (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
Corridor Company, the leading provider of contract lifecycle management software powered by the SharePoint and Office 365 platforms, will exhibit at the IACCM Americas Forum 2015 in Henderson, Nevada, on October 6-8, 2015. An event sponsor, Corridor will join contract managers and general counsels from around the world at this annual conference.
This is Corridor’s eighth year at the conference.
Corridor CEO, Russ Edelman, will serve as moderator of morning sessions for Day 2, October 7, Track B – Risk Management. These session will include "Changing Behaviors" with Greg Tennyson, Chief Procurement Officer, VSP Global, and "Redesigning Contract Management" with Pam Nanavaty, Xifinity Communities Contracts Manager, Comcast.
The IACCM Americas Forum is one of the key conferences and workshops produced by the International Association for Contract and Commercial Management, a non-profit organization that enables both public and private sector organizations and professionals to achieve world-class standards in their contracting and relationship management process and skills. IACCM has over 35,220 members from more than 159 countries and 14,359 organizations.
IACCM Americas Forum offers an extraordinary variety of speakers, topics and approaches to the challenges of contract management. Each day balances powerful conference-wide events with track-based sessions that focus on different goals of the profession and encourage maximum interaction.
Edelman states, “We consistently remain impressed with the leadership of IACCM and the attendees who come to their conferences. IACCM’s CEO Tim Cummins and his team strive for driving as much value into their community as possible and this is repeatedly evidenced by the great results that come from their conferences. It is truly a pleasure to be partaking in the IACCM conference as a key sponsor for the eighth consecutive year.”
Corridor welcomes visitors to its exhibitor booth throughout the conference.
About Corridor Company
Corridor Company is committed to continually evolving our software product line to meet the challenges of contracts and their proper management. With a business application platform that readily provides solutions for Contract, Proposal and Supplier Management, Corridor's end-to-end solutions enable customers to create contracts and proposals more efficiently, manage all processes more effectively, and ensure that revenue, profit and compliance are all fully optimized. Corridor's flexible licensing model, supporting implementation packages, and delivery options which include on premises, in the Cloud, or Office 365, ensure a solution tailored to fit the needs of companies, including global enterprises. To learn why global to mid-sized clients choose Corridor as their Contract Management partner, visit http://www.corridorcompany.com .
